title: Ticket #1678: Change EXCEPT to emit limits, etc.
description:
Change the EXCEPT(), if possible, to emit much more information about the process during an exception. Information emitted should be things like: all getrlimits, max fds available to process, memory size of process, etc, etc, etc.

This will greatly help in understanding the conditions under which Condor processes fail.
